Salina Sofa

Salina by TA Design is a modular sofa system that combines the geometric simplicity of the stainless steel frame with the enveloping softness of the voluminous cushions. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”column_reverse” column_direction_phone=”column_reverse” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top info-prodotto-pagina” id=”calima” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”right” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” sticky_content=”true” sticky_content_functionality=”js” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_blank” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]With Salina, the simplicity of forms merges with absolute comfort, offering a relaxation space that perfectly adapts to the natural environment. Refined and elegant, it is designed to embrace and envelop, providing moments of pure well-being.

Salina is available in two technical variants:

  • Open-cell, draining polyurethane foam, which ensures optimal ventilation and rapid drainage, keeping the structure dry.
  • Standard closed-cell polyurethane, with a waterproof and drip-resistant cover that guarantees resistance to humidity and long-lasting durability.

The powder-coated steel base offers robustness, stability, and a modern design that integrates perfectly with any outdoor space.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true”
